message.content:
The problem asks to identify the amount of profit the entity retains after all expenses, including operating costs, interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization, are deducted from total revenue. This figure is essentially "Net Profit" reported within the cash flow statement.

Looking at the provided accounts, the line item labeled exactly as "Net Profit" contains the relevant value.

From the table:  
| Account              | Amount       | Date       |  
|----------------------|--------------|------------|  
| Net Profit           | -1401436.89  | 2024-01-30 |

Thus, the value of the amount of profit retained after all expenses have been deducted is **-1401436.89**.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "-1401436.89"}}
```
